data.title: Simple B Site Post Plant Haunts from B Yellow
data.description: Here are three simple B Site Post Plant Haunts from B Yellow, that can all be thrown from behind B Yellow to scan enemy players both as they are attempting to retake space on Site, and/or to scan them as they attempt to defuse the Spike.

data.title: Front B Site Post Plant Haunt from B Green
data.description: Here's a great post plant Haunt lineup from B Green, that can allow you to more easily / better take advantage of the Haunt.

data.title: Front A Site Execute Haunt
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Haunt to clear out many of the commonly held angles in front A Site, while also revealing players in several other commonly held angles deeper into Site.
